w:r.w:t: A library for printing colored text, getting colored input, changing Qt5 controls' colors.
一个用来打印彩色文字、获取彩色的输入、更改
Best use in Python 3.8 or new versions.
If you want to use all functions in this package, please use on Windows operating system.
如果你想要使用这个库的所有功能，请在

1.Print with a function that prints colored text
用打印彩色文字的函数打印文字
"This is a very light green text.")
"This is a light green text too.", 2)
# You can see the result of this example in the library's
) function or by typing "color_text-example.cmd" in CMD after installing the library.
函数中看到这个例子的结果。（如果计算机默认语言是中文的就会看到中文结果，函数的顺序是一样的）

() function is used to set the color of the text, where the color parameter is the color to be set and the handle parameter is the handle to the color to be set (the default is
函数使用来设置文本颜色的，其中

) function is used to restore the color to its default value, where the handle parameter is the handle to the restored color (the default is

4.Change the color of text of PyQt5 and PySide2 controls
In the above example, replace the control parameter with your
color parameter with the color you want and
the controls parameter with controls that you want to change color (Default value is "*").
参数替换成你的控件，把
参数替换成你想要的颜色，把
参数替换成你要更改颜色的控件（默认值为
参数替换成红色的量、绿色的量、蓝色的量
# Note: Replace the red, green and blue parameters with red, green and blue parameters.
How to write the "controls" parameter controls
If you have many controls, use ", "to separate each control; if you have only one, write that control; if you want to change the text color of all controls, use" * ".
把每一个控件分开，如果只有一个控件，那就写那个控件，如果要更改全部控件的文字颜色，用

给视频添加图片、文字水印

Examples of this library can only run on Windows systems.
If you want to run a print text example of this library, install the library and enter the following command at CMD.
如果要运行这个库的打印文字的示例，请安装本库，并在
If you want to run a get input example of this library, install the library and enter the following command at CMD.
如果要运行这个库的获取输入的示例，请安装本库，并在
If you want to run all the examples of this library, install the library and enter the following command at CMD.
如果要运行这个库的所有示例，请安装本库，并在
) and Print() functions have been added.
) function for printing custom color text.
增加了用来打印自定义颜色的文字的
Added the ability to Print custom colored text to
函数增加了打印自定义颜色的文字的功能。
Error messages are printed when an incompatible operating system is encountered.
在遇到不兼容的操作系统时会打印错误信息。
All functions that print colored text can be separated by commas like the built-in function
让所有打印有颜色的文字的函数都可以像内置函数
一样将要打印的文字用逗号分开。
Added a function to get input.
添加了获取输入的函数。
增加了详细的版本信息。
Added the error screen buffer handle variable and the input screen buffer handle variable.
增加了错误屏幕缓冲区句柄的变量和输入屏幕缓冲区的句柄变量。
The handle argument is added to the
函数中添加了句柄参数。
增加了用来查看所有颜色的
) function had no output at some point.
Fixed the problem of importing other libraries in some cases.
解决了某些情况下会导入一些其它库的问题。
Fixed a problem in the tutorial.
修复了教程中的一个问题。
Added tutorials for each function in the built-in
Fixed a problem in the tutorial.
修复了教程中的一个问题。
增加了细化的信息变量。
A Chinese example has been added in color_text-example.cmd.
The help Markdown file, help HTML file, and help Word file have been added to the package.
Improved HTML tutorials in the package.
Added function to open tutorials directly in package.
增加了直接打开包中的教程的函数。
Functions that change controls of PyQt5 and PySide2 had been added.
Optimized the part of the installation library in the tutorial.
优化了教程中安装库的部分。
Added a large number of examples.
Fixed several bugs in this tutorial.
修复了教程中的若干个
Fixed a number of bugs encountered on Linux.
系统中会遇到的若干个
Added the ability to select some small Qt5 control to change the text color when changing the text color of a large Qt5 control.
控件的文字颜色时，选择要更改文字颜色的小
Fixed a syntax error in the tutorial.
修复了教程中的一个语法错误。
Fixed an issue where modules related to Qt5 could not be imported in some cases.
修复了在某些情况下无法导入有关
Fixed a problem that is other QSS failures after changing the text color of the Qt5 control.
控件的文字颜色后，其它
Added functions for adding image and text watermarks to videos.
增加了给视频添加图片、文字水印的功能。
Fixed an issue where the example could not run in some cases.
修复了在某些情况下无法运行示例的问题。
Fixed an issue where the modules could not import in some cases.
修复了在某些情况下无法导入模块的问题。
Fixed an issue where the package does not run in Python 3.9.x and 3.10.x.
Fixed some problems in the document.
修复了文档中的一些问题。

w:name.w:val: HTML 预设格式 字符
